Nemesis Enforcer:



Nemesis Enforcer stepped out of his CR chamber, fully repaired.  Of course, 
he still ached all over.He heard the alarms, and took out his rapid-firing 
lasr rifle, heading for the outside.

Reaching outside, he saw a proto human attacking.  Raising his rifle, he 
fired 20 rapid laser blasts off at the proto-human's chest, laughing.
